Name: Blueberry Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Rich blueberry fruit fortified with vodka made more interesting by a splash of wine.
